about: Hi I'm OMAR MAKRAM ELDEEB ,From Damanhur, Egypt. I Work As A Software Engineer And Specialize In Angular (2+) Front-End Web Development. My Passion Lies In Crafting Responsive Web Applications. Proficient In Angular Framework, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 5, JQuery, API Integration, ECMAScript 6, And JavaScript. I Thrive On Learning And Teamwork, Dedicated To Staying Updated On Industry Advancements And Emerging Technologies To Improve Skills And Deliver Innovative Solutions Consistently.
